summary: Two friends leave the picturesque yet rural province of Nova Scotia for the nightlife and culture of Toronto. They soon end up wistful and nostalgic about Nova Scotia though after finding out that Toronto isn't as fun as they'd hoped.
cast: Doug McGrath|Paul Bradley|Jayne Eastwood|Cayle Chernin|Nicole Morin|Pierre La Roche|Don Steinhouse|Ted Sugar|Ron Martin|Max Jones|Dennis Bishop|J.R. Zimmerman|Stuart Marwick|Mary Black|Sheila White|Ivor Jackson|Stan Ross|Ralph Stroh
title: Goin' Down the Road
